member.name: M:NetCore3_api.WebApi.Controllers.ChargeController.Get(System.Int64,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns charges for a specific user. Optional parameters allow result paging and sorting, default sort order is descending and will show most recent charges first.

member.name: M:NetCore3_api.WebApi.DTOs.GetInvoicesRequest.GetPeriodToSearch
member.summary: Returns a tuple with From - To month year dtos If a specific month year is specified, from - to response will match that specific period. If any month - year period is not valid, e.g. a field value is missing, method returns null
